x=int (raw_input())
a=[]
j=0
f=False
for i in range(0,x):
    l=0
    j=0
    f=False
    z=int (raw_input())
    y=raw_input()
    
    k=y.split(" ")
    #print k
    for j in range(0,len(k)):
        k[j]=int(k[j])
    #print "\n"
    #print k
    while l!=len(k):
        if k[l]>=l+1:
            k[l]=k[l]-l-1
           # print k
           # print "\n"
            if(f==True):
                f=False
            else:
                f=True
        if k[l]<l+1:
            l=l+1
    if f==True:
        print "ALICE"
    else:
        print "BOB"
